cert-fio38-c.description:
Description

The
cert-fio38-c
check is an alias, please see
misc-non-copyable-objects
for more
information.

This check corresponds to CERT C++ Coding Standard rule
FIO38-C. Do not copy a FILE object
.
cert-fio38-c.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
